Friends and Family, blood cancers impact hundreds of families day to day lives. Together with the Judge Group, I'm raising donations for the Leukemia Lymphoma Society. Please take a moment to donate (every cent counts!) or join us at their annual Light the Night event on 11/11.
Vice President Of Recruiting/National Delivery Manager
- Lead and manage a national recruiting team focusing primarily on IT and Finance positions. - Direct national delivery of enterprise level account.

- Lead a national recruiting and delivery team focusing on IT and Finance positions. - Source and place candidates consistently in all industry-related skill sets: Web/Application Developers (front-end, back-end and full-stack), Architects, DevOps Engineers, Systems/Network Administrators, Database Developers/Administrators, Business Analysts, Project/Program Managers and QA Engineers/Testers. - Coordinate directly with hiring managers to understand clients needs and find better qualified candidates.

- Source for outstanding tecnical and non-technical candidates, performing the full-cycle of recruiting up to salary negotiations and closing for contract, contract-to-hire and permanent positions - Execute comprehensive search strategies using Boolean logic and innovative methods to engage passive candidates, sucessfully encouraging them to pursue new and exciting opportunities

- Provide well-trained, high-quality assistance to student clients on speeches and presentations in a collaborative setting  - Mentor undergraduates in speech construction and delivery, tailored to the needs of individual students, as well as develop class-specific tutorials - Observe and encourage students’ progress toward higher levels of speaking competence, through a series of one-on-one consultations
- Organize and prepare players for five to six practices and multiple games per week- Lead staff of ten assistant managers in daily duties to achieve seamless execution during practices and game days

summary: National Recruiting/Delivery Manager specializing in IT and Finance positions, focusing on all skill sets and areas of expertise.  Contact Info: Phone: 602-385-0063Email: asandilands@judge.comAbout The Judge Group:   Founded in 1970 by Martin E. Judge Jr., The Judge Group is a professional services firm offering Technology Consulting, Enterprise-Wide Staffing and Corporate Training. The Judge Group has long believed in strong companies and the talented people who help them grow. Forty-plus years of experience have taught us how to best address the cultural and economic needs of our clients, expertly assist candidates in navigating through their own unique career progressions, and create, maintain, and nurture valued community partnerships. We understand that every business is unique, and that paying careful attention to the specific needs of every client, from our multi-national corporate clients to our entry-level programmers, is the only way to ensure success for everyone involved.
